page.title: 02Sports at Lough Neagh,Lurgan
page.content: Kinnegoe Bay is a naturally sheltered area,making it an ideal place for a wide variety of water sports. The Sailing Club at Oxford Island provides modern facilities for its members. In Kinnegoe Marina,equipment can be bought or hired,and tuition received in many water sports. The most popular sports are sailing, windsurfing,water-skiing,canoeing and fishing. The roads leading to the area are of a very high standard,and it is situated close to the M.1.roundabout. This makes it easy for people from a wide area to use the facilities. Competitions are frequently organised in all the different sports.
